text: Kamen Rider Ghost is a Japanese tokusatsu drama, Kamen Rider Series. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time aired alongside Shuriken Sentai Ninninger and later Doubutsu Sentai Zyuohger. ==Cast== * Takeru Tenkūji / Kamen Rider Ghost: Shun Nishime * Akari Tsukimura: Hikaru Ohsawa * Makoto Fukami / Kamen Rider Specter: Ryosuke Sakamoto * Onari: Takayuki Yanagi * Alain / Kamen Rider Necrom: Hayato Isomura * Shibuya: Takuya Mizoguchi * Narita: Reo Kansyuji * Yasushi Odenara: Yasuomi Sano * Kanon Fukami: Mio Kudo * Fumi Fukushima: Hisako Ohkata * Chikara Saionji: Yoshiyuki Morita * Steve Bills: Thane Camus * Javel: Sotaro * Igor: Hiroshi Yamamoto * Gyro: Seiji Takaiwa * Adel, Gammisers (Voice; 35-45 human form): Akihiro Mayama * Alia / Kamen Rider Necrom P, Alicia: Reon Kadena * Adonis: Hiroshi Katsuno * Ryū Tenkūji: Kazuhiko Nishimura * Hermir/Edith: Naoto Takenaka * Yurusen (Voice): Aoi Yūki * Ghost Driver Equipment Voice, Eyecon Driver G Voice: m.c.A.T * Mega Ulorder and Equipment Voice: Peter von Gomm * Hoodle Ghosts (Voice), Transformation Gamma Eyecon Voice: Tomokazu Seki * Gasai Gamma (Voice): Taiki Matsuno * Gammisers (Voice; 23-34, 47-49): Sayaka Ohara * Narration: Kazuya Ichijō ===Guest cast=== * Mari Shirase (3): Yukari Taki * Yamato Kizakiri / Zyuoh Eagle (24): Masaki Nakao * Yuki Shirai (29, 30, 46): Arisa Komiya * Honami (36, 37): Makoto Okunaka * Ako (36, 37): Rin Honoka * Ryōsuke Shinozaki (39, 40): Takumi Tsutsui * Miyamoto Musashi (46): Mitsuru Karahashi * Takeru's mother (49): Tomoka Kurokawa * Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (Voice; 50): Hiroki Ijima ===The 100 Eyecons and Ghost's Fated Moment cast=== * Miyamoto Musashi: Mitsuru Karahashi * Himiko: Yuka Hirata * Robin Hood: Naoki Komatsu * Jared / Kamen Rider Necrom R: Hiroyuki Yasoshima (of 2700) * Gervil / Kamen Rider Necrom B: Tsuno * Jay / Kamen Rider Necrom Y: Yuko Takayama * Argos / Kamen Rider Dark Ghost/Extremer: Ryo Kimura * Daigo Fukami / Kamen Rider Zero Specter: Ikki Sawamura ===Kamen Rider Saber x Ghost series cast=== ;Kamen Rider Specter x Blades cast * Kanon Fukami / Kamen Rider Kanon Specter: Mio Kudo ==Theme song== ; Opening theme * "Warera Omou, Yue ni Warera Ari" ("We Think, Therefore We Are") ** Lyrics & Composition: Show Ayanocozey ** Arrangement: Takeshi Kiuchi ** Artist: Kishidan Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:2015 Japanese television series debuts Category:2016 television series endings Category:2016 disestablishments in Asia
title: Kamen Rider Ghost
